trans-unit.source: Creates a control that generates a list of items in a bulleted format.
trans-unit.target: 建立產生項目符號格式項目清單的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the BulletedList control to create a list of items that are formatted with bullets.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#Introduction) - [協助工具](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 簡介使用 BulletedList 控制項來建立格式化的項目清單項目符號。

trans-unit.source: To specify the individual list items that you want to appear in a BulletedList control, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定您想要設定 BulletedList 控制項中顯示的個別清單項目，加上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>每個項目的開頭和結尾標記 BulletedList 控制項之間的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: To specify the bullet type to use to display list items in a BulletedList control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to one of the bullet types that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用來顯示清單項目設定 BulletedList 控制項中的項目符號類型，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>屬性所定義的項目符號類型的其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available bullet styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的項目符號樣式。

trans-unit.source: |Bullet style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|Not set.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An empty circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled square.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A custom image.| Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: |項目符號樣式 |描述 | |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|未設定。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|數字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|小寫字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|大寫字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|小寫羅馬數字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|大寫羅馬數字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|填滿的圓形。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|空心圓圈。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A 方填滿。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|自訂映像。 | 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>屬性可指定清單項目已排序的 BulletedList 控制項中的編號起始值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> property is ignored, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> field.
trans-unit.target: 值指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>屬性會被忽略，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> to specify a custom image for the bullet, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property also to specify the location of the image file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>屬性設為值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>至指定的項目符號的自訂映像，您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A>屬性也可指定影像檔的位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the display behavior of the list items in a BulletedList, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property to one of the values that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在設定 BulletedList 指定清單項目顯示行為，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>屬性設為其中一個值所定義的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defined display behaviors are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 定義的顯示這些行為屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is clicked, it navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 按一下超連結時，它會巡覽至 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>屬性，以指定的 URL 超連結瀏覽至。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A> property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is navigated to when a hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示時按一下超連結瀏覽至網頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, the BulletedList control displays list items as links that post back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>，設定 BulletedList 控制項會顯示清單項目做為回傳至伺服器時按下的連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions that are performed when a link button is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式控制連結按鈕時執行的動作，提供的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A> properties are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and are not applicable to the BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A>屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別，並不適用於設定 BulletedList 控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a BulletedList that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件資料的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>類別，以判斷連結中的按鈕已按下設定 BulletedList 的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The BulletedList control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: BulletedList 控制項也支援資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: To bind the BulletedList to a data source, you can use any of the provided data-binding mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 若要將設定 BulletedList 的繫結至資料來源，您可以使用任何提供的資料繫結機制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: # # 協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針可能不符合協助工具呈現，根據預設，此控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 用來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>的新執行個體的設定 BulletedList 的建構函式

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control to render to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTML 屬性和樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項轉譯為指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used primarily by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles into the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> output stream for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 方法由控制項開發人員主要是用來插入適當的屬性和樣式到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>的輸出資料流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack*> property for the base class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack*>基底類別屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack*>的值

trans-unit.source: The AutoPostBack property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: AutoPostBack 屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: Do not assign a value to the AutoPostBack property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿 AutoPostBack 屬性指派值。

trans-unit.source: If you do assign a value to the AutoPostBack, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不要指派值給 AutoPostBack<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 嘗試指派值給 AutoPostBack。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for each bullet in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示中的每個項目符號之影像的路徑<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The path to an image to display as each bullet in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示在每個項目符號之影像的路徑<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bullet style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目符號樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> property to specify the bullet style to apply to the list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>屬性來指定要套用至清單項目中的項目符號樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Bullet style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|Not set.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An empty circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled square.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A custom image.| Specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> value allows you to supply your own image for the bullet.
trans-unit.target: |項目符號樣式 |描述 | |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|未設定。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|數字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|小寫字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|大寫字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|小寫羅馬數字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|大寫羅馬數字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|填滿的圓形。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|空心圓圈。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A 方填滿。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|自訂映像。 | 指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>值可讓您提供自己的映像，項目符號。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> value, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property to the URL of the custom image to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>值，您也必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A>屬性要使用自訂影像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control does not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項不支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性因為項目符號為裝飾性本質上並不提供必須傳達透過輔助技術的其他資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要使用的自訂映像來傳達給使用者的概念，您應該將額外的文字加入每個項目符號清單項目，或使用可讓您指定每個影像的替代文字的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的型別不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a link button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於中的連結按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when a list item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 中的清單項目時，會引發 Click 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.target: 若要啟用清單項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>以引發 Click 事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>屬性首先必須設定為值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>控制項</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>中

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display mode of the list content in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示模式清單的內容中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the DisplayMode property to specify the display behavior to apply to the content of list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DisplayMode 屬性來指定要套用至清單中的項目內容的顯示行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The DisplayMode property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: DisplayMode 屬性設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Displayed as| |-----------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Hyperlinks.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Link buttons.| The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> value allows you to display list content as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: |值 |顯示為 | |-----------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|超連結。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|按鈕連結。 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>值可讓您顯示成超連結的清單內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 按一下時，超連結瀏覽至 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>屬性，以指定的 URL 超連結瀏覽至。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> field allows you to display list content as links.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>欄位可讓您以連結方式顯示清單內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName> event to post back to the server when a link button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName>事件張貼至伺服器，按一下連結按鈕時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 指定的型別不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，清單中的項目已排序編號起始<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the FirstBulletNumber property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FirstBulletNumber 屬性來指定編號的清單項目已排序的起始值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the FirstBulletNumber property is ignored, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略已指派給 FirstBulletNumber 屬性的值，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the value of the FirstBulletNumber property is an integer, it does not always cause a bullet to render as a number.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 FirstBulletNumber 屬性的值是一個整數，它不一定會造成項目符號呈現的數字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the FirstBulletNumber property to `4` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, the first bullet number will render as a lowercase d.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將 FirstBulletNumber 屬性設定為`4`和設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>屬性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>，第一個項目符號數字會轉譯為小寫的 d。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.

trans-unit.target: 預設值是`1`。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>中清單項目時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制表單回傳至伺服器時。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control when a link button within the item list is clicked.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法會在內部使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制當連結的項目清單中按一下按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The containing page specifies the index of the clicked link button in the `eventArgument` parameter, which is used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: [包含] 頁面指定的索引中的按下的連結按鈕`eventArgument`參數，用來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method raises a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event by passing the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>藉由傳遞初始化的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method optionally can perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法可以執行之前引發驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>控制項事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a link button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> is clicked, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> property to `true` and specify the group of controls to be validated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證頁面時內的連結按鈕上的控制項群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>按一下時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>屬性`true`並指定要在驗證控制項的群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The string representation for the index of the list item that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件的清單項目索引的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項內容到指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>用戶端上顯示的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員使用轉譯方法。

trans-unit.source: The Render method writes the rendered content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> items to the client using the supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法寫入目的呈現的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>用戶端會使用所提供的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> item is represented by an element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>項目中的項目所表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is empty, no content is rendered to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項是空的沒有內容呈現至<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection, the Render method writes the HTML content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有至少一個清單項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>轉譯方法寫入的 HTML 內容的集合，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.target: RenderBulletText 方法就會呈現每個清單項目中的項目符號文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制使用指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在目前選取之項目的以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In the base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> property returns a zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 在基底類別中， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性會傳回目前選取的項目以零為起始索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示會選取任何項目。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 屬性不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you use the `get` accessor for the SelectedIndex property, it always returns `-1`.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**當您使用`get`SelectedIndex 屬性存取子，它會一律傳回`-1`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to use the `set` accessor for the SelectedIndex property raises a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試使用`set`SelectedIndex 屬性存取子會引發<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件資料的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>類別以決定索引中的連結按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>已按下的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是在視覺化設計工具，可繫結，但可在執行階段繫結。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Always returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a value to the SelectedIndex.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試指派值給 SelectedIndex。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.target: 預設值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SelectedValue property is set internally based on the selected list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SelectedValue 屬性中的選取的清單項目設定內部基礎<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.target: TagKey 屬性用於判斷<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>相關聯的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>

trans-unit.source: The HTML text writer tag value.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文字寫入器標記值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，其中顯示中的超連結時，連結至 Web 網頁內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values that are listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.
trans-unit.target: 值必須以字母中的 A 到 Z 範圍 （不區分大小寫） 的特殊值以外下表中所列的開頭為底線開頭。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|Renders the content in the immediate frame-set parent.| |`_search`|Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: |值 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。 | |`_parent`|即時運算框架設定的父代中呈現內容。 | |`_search`|[搜尋] 窗格中呈現內容。 | |`_self`|呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。 | |`_top`|框架不完整的視窗中呈現內容。 | > [!NOTE] > 檢查您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否`_search`支援值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更新版本都支援`_search`目標值。

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁中的超連結時，連結至目標屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: To display the content of the list items as hyperlinks in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示為超連結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>屬性設為值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>設定</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>中的清單項目的內容

trans-unit.source: Then, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property of each list item to the URL of the Web page to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 然後，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>至 URL 的網頁瀏覽至每個清單項目的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Target property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定目標屬性，在瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗時重新整理按一下超連結。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果要設定的目標屬性的轉譯的輸出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> 時建立可存取網頁，強烈建議您避免使用的目標屬性指向另一個視窗。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 目標視窗或框架，以便載入網頁連結至中的超連結時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: 如果您直接將文字屬性<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: You can then access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Text%2A>
